NewsArticle.Title: Dark Ages Version 4.51 beta test
NewsArticle.Content: All registered players are invited to the Dark Ages 4.51 beta test. Just download the client, install ,and play. But please be aware of the following before downloading: 1. All your characters progress in the beta test will not roll over to the Commercial server. 2. Please report all bugs to da-bugs@darkages.com and please put the phrase 4.51 in the subject line. 3. Since this is purely for testing version 4.51 being OOC is acceptable and there are no new areas or features implemented yet.
